snippet.title: Chivalry 2 - Game Pass Trailer
snippet.description:
Chivalry 2 joins Game Pass on Xbox and PC with the Reinforced Update out now on all platforms! Fight in the Hippodrome, wield the dual-bladed Katars and much more.

Chivalry 2 is available now with Cross-Play on Steam, Epic Games Store, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4 & PlayStation 5. 

Discord: http://discord.gg/chivalry2
Twitter: http://twitter.com/chivalrygame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Chivalry2
Website: http://chivalry2.com

Torn Banner Studios
Twitter: http://twitter.com/tornbanner
Facebook: http://facebook.com/tornbannerstudios
Website: http://tornbanner.com
